values.description: Libraries are QuantConnect projects you can merge into your project to avoid duplicating code files. Use libraries to share tools across several projects.
values.keywords: libraries, add library, remove library, delete library, manage libraries
values.og:description: Libraries are QuantConnect projects you can merge into your project to avoid duplicating code files. Use libraries to share tools across several projects.
